message: I propose dividing the money into $6000 for me and $4000 for you. Let's agree on this fair distribution.
I think we can both do better. I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor. This way, we both get more than your previous offer.
Considering the inflation, I believe a 50/50 split would be fair and beneficial for both of us. Let's aim for equality in this round.
